product.name: Delta Leland One-Handle Kitchen Faucet with Pulldown Spray
product.description: Leland 2-hole, one-handle kitchen faucet with pulldown spray. Leland(R), traditional styling and modern functionality come together in dramatic fashion for a timeless look. The Delta(R)-exclusive MagnaTite(TM) docking system keeps the spray wand securely in place for picture-perfect grace.
product.shortDescription: Leland 2-hole, one-handle kitchen faucet with pulldown spray.

features.feature: A charming teapot-inspired series of faucets for the entire home.
Timeless design is a perfect marriage of both form and function.
High-arc spout swivels 360 degrees for complete sink access
The pull-down spray wand features a 59'' hose providing a 20'' reach
13 7/8'' high-arc spout provides extra clearance for deep pots and pans

notes.note: Additional Info: comes with extra o-rings
